about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer creating digital solutions that bridge innovation and functionality
about.description1: Data Engineer and Full-Stack Developer with a passion for building scalable solutions that transform complex data challenges into actionable insights.
about.description2: Currently at Genpact, architecting robust data pipelines with Databricks and Apache Airflow. I bridge the gap between raw data and business intelligence, delivering end-to-end solutions from infrastructure to visualization.
about.warning: Driven by the belief that clean code and well-structured data are the foundation of every successful digital product.
